story.title: My Confidant - Episode 3
story.storyDescription: When Lucy hears a stranger break into her apartment, she texts her long-distance boyfriend, Brendan. Too bad there’s nothing he can do to save her…
story.creator: web-uploader

messages.text: OMG Topher!
I saw them pull your body out of our apartment
It was a big police scene with everything—the caution tape, the body bag—everything.
I’m alive
I was never in that body bag.
I can’t believe this.
Can’t, or won’t?
Ask me anything.
What’d I have for dinner tonight?
Come on, that’s impossible for a normal person to remember.
If you were really my roommate, it wouldn’t be impossible
We ate dinner together
Yeah, while we were watching reruns of Friends
We watched your favorite episode: The One Where Everyone Finds Out.
Okay, this is freaky. You’re probably Topher then.
But I still want you to try to guess what I had for dinner
Then I’ll believe you.
Lucy, I don’t mean to be an asshole, but this is kind of dumb
I was abducted from my apartment tonight.
And now I’m stuck in some kind of abandoned warehouse
OMG, I’m in a creepy warehouse too!
See?! We don’t have time for this bullshit
You’ve gotta believe that it’s me.
That I’m alive.
Topher, the dinner
Just take one guess
You told me not to text anyone
But if you don’t guess…
I’m texting Brendan to tell him you’re alive
He keeps texting me. I don’t want to make him wait.
OMG DON’T text Brendan
Hold on, it’s coming back to me…
It was penne and broccoli!
I remember the smell of the garlic
And then after you were finished, you did what you always do.
You had a spoonful of sour cream.
Topher -- it IS you! You’re alive!
Finally
Thank God you believed me.
Sorry. 😳
It’s okay. But Lucy, you said Brendan’s been texting you during our conversation?
Yeah, why?
You gotta text him something so he doesn’t get suspicious.
OMG--you’re right
He’s probably freaking out right now.
Lucy clicks on the text message conversation between her and Brendan.
Luce??!
Are you there?
What the fuck, Luce?!
Sorry, sorry. I shouldn’t have cursed like that
I’m just so damn worried
Please let me know you’re okay.
Brendan, I’m sorry
I thought I heard someone coming so I hid my cellphone.
For 20 minutes?
Look, Brendan, I’m scared
Everything’s been happening so fast tonight
And I’m afraid something even worse is going to happen to me.
I need to be completely aware of my surroundings in case it does.
Luce, I was helping you
We gotta do this together
So you can some back and live with me.
Why are you so fixated on that? On me coming back?
Never mind.
Please?
I want to be supportive
I’m glad you do. But in order to be supportive…
You’ve gotta trust me to do this on my own
That’s the point, dammit!
We were supposed to be a goddamned team!
What?
That came out wrong.
I want to be a team
I want to help you
We’re not supposed to split up.
Brendan, I gotta go
It’s for my own safety.
Lucy, no.
Lucy clicks on the text message conversation between her and Topher.
Okay, I checked in with Brendan
He was acting a little weird, like kinda controlling
I told you!
He’s always so controlling
I don’t really want to get into this right now, Topher
You always pit him against me
I know you guys don’t exactly get along
That’s because he’s intimidated by me.
I’m not justifying that comment with a response
Let’s move on—I think I was able to put him off for a bit.
Good.
Because Lucy, Brendan is dangerous
I know that you think you love him…
Excuse me?
I THINK that I love him?!
I’ve kinda been dating him for 3 years, Topher
I KNOW that I love him .
Okay, okay
I know you love the person you THINK he is
But he’s someone completely different.
What?!
What aren’t you telling me?
When I was bound and gagged in the backseat of a random car…
I heard the driver say, “Ok, Mr. Brittlesman”
What?!
He had to have been talking to Brendan
That’s absurd
It had to have been another Mr. Brittlesman
Come on, Lucy
That’s not a common last name.
I mean, I guess it could have been Brendan’s dad
His dad is dead
And his dad only had sisters…
See?
I mean, that doesn’t necessarily mean Brendan’s evil
Just entertain the idea for a little bit
Do you think it COULD be true?
Okay—you’re freaking me out a little
What do I do?
Brendan keeps texting me
How do I put him off?
You did it once, Lucy
Now you’ve got to do it again.
